graph_title: Number of beekeepers in the district
indicator_name: Number of beekeepers in the district
target_name: Measure - Promotion of the regional food system transition
page_content: The indicator shows the number of beekeepers in the district. How many of these beekeepers are certified according to the EC organic regulation has yet to be determined.

de.graph_title: Number of beekeepers in the district
de.page_content: Der Indikator zeigt die Anzahl der Imker im Bezirk. Wie viele dieser Imker nach der EG-Öko-Verordnung zertifiziert sind, muss noch ermittelt werden.
